title: The Bizarre Gladiator 2 We Almost Got
description:
This video is sponsored by Curiosity Stream. Get both Nebula and Curiosity Stream here:   https://curiositystream.com/captainmidnight for less than $15 a YEAR.
Ridley Scott's Gladiator was a huge hit back in 2000, even winning Best Picture. A few years later star Russell Crowe asked rock star Nick Cave to write a sequel. What he came up will never be shot, but that doesn't mean Gladiator 2 is off the table.
MERCH: https://standard.tv/collections/captain-midnight
